snippet: Newly released documents revealed the stark contrast between Mayor Bill de Blasio and his billionaire predecessor, Michael R. Bloomberg, as well as Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.
abstract: Newly released tax documents reveal stark contrast between New York Mayor Bill de Blasio and his billionaire predecessor, Michael R Bloomberg, as well as New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo; de Blasio and his wife Chirlane McCray reported $165,047 in adjusted gross income for 2013.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

lead_paragraph: Newly released documents revealed the stark contrast between Mayor Bill de Blasio and his billionaire predecessor, Michael R. Bloomberg, as well as Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.

headline.main: Talk About Income Inequality: De Blasio Is No Bloomberg, Tax Returns Confirm
headline.print_headline: Talk About Income Inequality: De Blasio Is No Bloomberg, Tax Returns Confirm
